content.text: Hi, it's nice to meet you. What's your name?
Hi, I'm [user 2's name]. I'm ten years old.
Oh, that's great! I'm [user 1's name], I'm 26 years old. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to cook, but I don't like baking. I also like to go bowling with my parents on weekends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to cook too, but I'm not very good at it. I used to play drums at a beachside bar for a week, but I don't play anymore.
Oh, that's cool! I wish I could play an instrument. I love music! I have a Kesha concert ticket stub that I cherish.
That's awesome! I love Kesha too! I went to her concert last year. It was so much fun!
Oh, that's great! I wish I could have gone. I'm a big fan of hers.
Me too! She's one of my favorite artists.
What's your favorite song by her?
It's hard to choose, but I think my favorite song is "Tik Tok."
That's a good song! I like "Your Love" a lot too.
That's a good one too! I love her music.
Yeah, it is! I'm glad I met you. You seem really cool.
